title: Grand Theft Auto III - GTA 3 Action Adventure 2002 PC-Game
description:
Grand Theft Auto III - PC-GAME Action-Adventure.
A young criminal is betrayed by his girlfriend, Catalina, during a robbery. 
He then scores a lucky jailbreak after he is arrested, with his trusted 
partner, 8 Ball. Both of these hoodlums are now in Liberty City, both 
knowing Catalina is there. But everyone in the city seems to want him dead. 
He will have to rob, steal, and kill to stay out of serious trouble and 
take revenge on Catalina. GTA-3 game played from a third-person view. Players 
complete missionsâ€”linear scenarios with set objectivesâ€”to progress through 
the story. It is possible to have several active missions running at one time, 
as some missions require players to wait for further instructions or events. 
Outside of missions, players can freely roam the game's open world, and have 
the ability to complete option side missions. Liberty City is composed of 
three boroughs: Portland, Staunton Island, and Shoreside Vale; the islands 
are unlocked to players as the story progresses.

Info.
=>-Developer......................: DMA Design.
=>-Publisher......................: Rockstar Games.
=>-Platform.......................: Microsoft Windows.
=>-Release date...................: 24 May 2002.
=>-Genre..........................: Action-adventure Open World.
=>-Mode...........................: Single player.
=>-Media..........................: 2 X CD.

System Specifications.
Minimum system requirements :.....: Recommended system requirements.
CPU 450 MHz :.....................: CPU 700 MHz CPU.
Memory 96 MB RAM :................: Memory 128 MB RAM.
GPU 16 MB DX3D Graphics :.........: GPU 32 MB DX3D Graphics.
Direct X 8.1 :....................: Direct X 8.1
OS Win98/ME/2K/XP/wIN7/WIN10 :....: OS Win98/ME/2K/XP/wIN7/WIN10.
HDD Space 500MB :.................: HDD Space 1.20GB.

Media Files.
=>-GTA3_AUDIO.iso.
=>-GTA3_INSTALL.iso.

Quick Install Instructions.
=>-Mount or insert GTA3_INSTALL.
=>-Install Game.
=>-Apply gta3patch.
=>-Replace Games gta3.exe with one provided.
=>-Mount or insert GTA3_AUDIO.
=>-Copy audio folder from imagedisk to games directory.
